instruction: Select one entry for blank from corresponding column of choices. Fill the blank in the way that best completes the text

tasks.text: Dominant interests often benefit most from _________ of governmental interference in business, since they are able to take care of themselves if left alone
tasks.explanation:
The sentence explains why dominant interests often behefit from a certain condition. Since the explanation is that they are able to take care of themselves if left alone.
Thus the correct answer is elimination(Chooice E)
